name: noisette shawlette

full_text: Knit the Noisette Shawlette, a delicate accessory designed by Trust the Mojo with just one ball of Concept Silky Lace. This small scarf is worked from tip to tip, with integrated I-cord edges and a pattern that combines wavy textures and openwork reminiscent of tiny hazelnuts. An elegant design with bias-knit tips, perfect for wrapping gently around the neck or draping over the shoulders. Enjoy knitting this stylish shawlette in your favourite shades of Concept Silky Lace. Noisette Shawlette is the perfect handmade gift for this Christmas!
